title: (x) "Your Workforce Resource" Handwritten script - Annifont {Dennis}
content:
Any ideas on this one? Customer is asking for this again.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201145607im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_6535.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201145607/http:/typophile.com/files/font_61.jpg) | 9.45 KB |

 [‹ (x) "nice'n easy" serif logo - ITC Garamond {J. Edward Sanchez}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201145607/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31320 "Go to previous forum topic") [Helvetica alternatives ala Nick Shinn's Preface? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201145607/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28000 "Go to next forum topic")
author: amiart

comments.content: Very close to [Longhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201145607/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=2&displayfontid=C.107035.0.0&fontRendererText=Your+Workforce+Resource), one of the natural handwriting fonts.

I had found longhand also.. It is pretty similar.. I went thru mikes handwriting guide and did’nt find anything any closer. I broke this all apart in photoshop to see if the letters matched up and they do.. It is a font.. just not sure what one..

Less similar, but also well done is [Calliope](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201145607/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=2&displayfontid=MVB.119156.0.0&fontRendererText=Your+Workforce+Resource).

Identified.. on another forum... as annifont

[http://www.abstractfonts.com/font/733?text=YourWorkforceRes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201145607/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/733?text=YourWorkforceRes "http://www.abstractfonts.com/font/733?text=YourWorkforceRes")
Yikes, that definitely shows off its free font quality at that size. Not bad when small, though.
